channel.title: Haven : City Construction and Planning
channel.description:
Haven, the idealic city for any citizens of MineCraft, is currently being planned and built. It is a town situated 200-300 metres (50 blocks or so) from the sea, and a beautiful beach will be terraformed there.
It will have a minecart track built in, not only taking you around the city in safe, zombie proof underground tunnels, but also to other cities and well-known, rich mines. There may be a small fee (players will be operators, it will only be like 1 wood or something), but a high-tech system using redstone will be in place.
[b][u]Things you can expect[/u][/b] [ul][li]A kind city, occupied by both the rich and poor.[/li] [li]A florists stocking saplings flowers so that you can plant any trees you like, and decorate your garden.[/li] [li]Appropriate taxes based on your worth.[/li] [li]A free to use banking system, where you can deposit a small fee to have your own chest(s) in the bank, only accesible by you![/li] [li]Pre-made houses, or you can buy a plot of land to buy your own![/li] [li]A fair King who listens to what YOU want![/li][/ul]
And lots more, [b]I will post more when I know more about what it's going to be like[/b].

item.title: Haven : City Construction and Planning
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

ranger squad:

I am jameskmonger ingame. Ok, but the planning rules are: It must be less than 1 block away from another building (i.e. touching or only a 1 block gap) to create a city feel.

Kk but I’m going to reserve a spot for a home and a small backyard area

Read full topic

item.title: Haven : City Construction and Planning
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

I am currently considering three designs of the city, would you like the city to be facing the spawn area (north), facing away from the spawn area (south), facing east or facing west? There will be exits, but by “facing”, I mean which side of the city the port will be on.

Read full topic

item.title: Haven : City Construction and Planning
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

Living in a city:
Protection, a zombie, skeleton, etc, coming into the city will be killed.
Community, it’s a lot more fun that living by yourself.
Top of the jobs list, if you live in Haven, are looking for a job, and one pops up in Haven, you will be given priority over a non-Havener.

And much more.

Read full topic
